mapper.insert: insert into PRODUCTREVIEW(RNO, WRITER, TITLE, STAR, CONTENT, PCODE) VALUES(PRODUCTREVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{star}, #{content}, #{pcode})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from productreview where pcode = 'S1' order by rno desc) a) where rn > (#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount} and rn <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}
select count(*) as total from productreview
mapper.update: update PRODUCTREVIEW set title = #{title}, star = #{star}, content = #{content}, updatedate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select star from productreview where pcode = 'S1'
select count(*) from productreview where writer = #{userId}
